publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7139 Claire Baker: Launch of Fife Youth Radio—That the Parliament congratulates Fife Youth Radio (FYR) on its official launch on 2 October 2010; notes that the radio station’s programmes will be broadcast live from its studios in Windygates across the world through the internet; welcomes the radio station’s focus on getting young people involved in their local community and giving them the chance to learn broadcasting skills through high-quality training workshops that offer opportunities to contribute to the radio station’s output; encourages listeners to tune in at www.fyr.org.uk, and wishes FYR all the best for the future.
S3M-7139 Launch of Fife Youth Radio (lodged on 4 October 2010) Jamie Hepburn*
